DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Blood Cell Transcriptome Normal Weight Obese Subjects 3 Caloric Doses High-fat Meal
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria normal weight subject : age 2550 20 < BMI > 25 waist circumference < 94cm Inclusion Criteria obese subject : age 2550 30 < BMI > 40 waist circumference > 102cm Exclusion Criteria group : physiological psychological disease allergy food intolerance highfat meal vegetarian , vegan chronic intake drug smoker diabetes mellitus type I II debiliating kidney disease debiliating liver disease clinically establish coronary heart diseases ingestion vitamin dietary supplement course study
